name: Figma Resume Templates [Community]
description:
As a resume reviewer for Boston University's Center for Career Development, I commonly have students ask for advice when designing a resume... especially when they have to start from a blank Google document. Thus, I created these resume templates!


This resource includes:

• A "design" resume

• A traditional/business-like resume

• A step-by-step instruction guide on how to use the file & export your document
